start.message: Welcome! What would you like to know about today?

virtual_index.message: We track virtual property shares similar to stock indices. Choose an index to view trends.

nifty_index.message:
The Nifty 50 Property Index tracks top 50 properties by market value across India.
➜ Avg Yield: 7.5% | Top Region: Mumbai | Last Month: +3%

sensex_index.message:
The Sensex Real Estate covers 30 premium properties in metro cities.
➜ Avg Yield: 6.8% | Top Region: Delhi NCR | Last Month: +2.5%
